text: Henrique de Campos Meirelles (born August 31, 1945) is a Brazilian politician. He is the former Minister of the Economy and former president of Central Bank of Brazil from 2003 to 2011. He is also a member of the board of directors of Azul Brazilian Airlines. In 2017, Meirelles launched his presidential campaign as a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement in the 2018 election. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian businesspeople Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Politicians from Goi√°s
title: Henrique Meirelles
